video_prompt: A woman with a focused expression subtly shifts, her sequined gown shimmering. Her glowing left hand carefully dips a golden rod into an amber liquid, causing ripples and reflections. Her right hand hovers, its ethereal glow pulsing, animating intricate golden symbols on the marble table that radiate shifting light onto nearby crystals. In the background, stars twinkle, a vibrant nebula dramatically swirls and intensifies its glow, while a silhouetted man subtly shifts his stance, turning his head to gaze at the cosmic spectacle as his nearby golden symbol pulsates.
image_prompt:
Here's a concise prompt, retaining the key visual information:

**"Highly detailed, visually rich image blending science fiction, fantasy, and opulent luxury. An elegant dark-haired woman, mid-20s/early 30s, focused, wears a shimmering silver sequined gown with an ornate golden choker and waist embellishment, and golden eyeshadow. Her hands glow with ethereal golden light. Her left hand holds a glowing golden stirring rod, dipping into an amber cocktail in a stemmed glass. Her right hand hovers over a luxurious white marble table with golden trim, above a large, intricate glowing golden alchemical/circuit symbol array. Two faceted golden crystals are on the table. In the background, an opulent interior with intricate golden Art Deco panels and large windows offering a breathtaking deep space view with a dramatic glowing nebula/galaxy and countless stars. A silhouetted man in a formal suit stands in the background, looking at space, near another glowing golden star-symbol. Warm, ethereal golden lighting dominates, creating a sophisticated, mysterious, futuristic elegance."**
refined_video_prompt: A woman's focused expression subtly shifts as her sequined gown shimmers. Her glowing left hand dips a golden rod, creating ripples and dynamic reflections in the amber liquid. Her right hand hovers, its ethereal glow pulsing, animating golden symbols on the table with shifting light that plays on nearby crystals. In the background, stars twinkle and a vibrant nebula dramatically swirls, intensifying its glow. A silhouetted man subtly shifts his stance, turning his head to gaze at the spectacle, his golden symbol pulsating.
